en.title: FE Creates Much Interest In Sri Lanka!
en.content:
REPORT BY PRESIDENTIAL DIRECTOR DATO' DR. BARANI KARUNAKARAN.
The Sri Lanka Investment Conference was held in Sri Lanka, Cinnamon Grand Hotel from 18-20th June 2010. The delegates of the conference were the business communities from Malaysia, Sri Lanka and Hong Kong. Presidential Directors Dato’ Dr. Barani and Mr. Karunakaran represented FusionExcel at the Conference. The Sri Lankan Deputy Economy Minister Muthu Sivalingam officially opened the Conference. The Deputy Director of Commerce from the Department of Commerce Ministry of Export Development & International Trade, Madam Gothami Indikadahena, presented a paper on the opportunities and the open door policies of the Sri Lankan government for foreign investors and companies. 

Presidential Director Dr. Barani presented FE's Quantum Pendant to all the VVIPs which included the Sri Lankan Deputy Economy Minister Muthu Sivalingam, GOPIA Malaysia President Mr. Selvarajoo Sundram, Dato’ Dr. V.Shanmughanathan Vice President of Kuala Lumpur & Selangor Indian Chamber of Commerce & Industry, Mr. Eswaran, Chairman of Eswaran Brothers Exports & Puan Sri Datin Seri N. Saraswathy Devi President of FIDA (2002 – 2005) International Federation of Woman Lawyers, Chairperson, Committee on Anti-Trafficking of Woman & Children . 

On the 2nd day of the conference, a buyers and sellers meet was held. Delegates were given opportunities to mingle and present their products and businesses. Presidential Directors Dr. Barani and Mr. Karunakaran grabbed the opportunity and met delegates in groups as well as on one to one basis. About 15 Quantum Pendant demonstrations were conducted. The Delegates were amazed to see the immediate effects of the Quantum Pendant and showed their interest by asking lots of questions. Many wanted to become Country Licensee and some bought our FusionExcel products. Many of the delegates from Malaysia bought our FusionExcel Quantum Pendant and wore them immediately. This generated much interest from other delegates who saw them, as they wanted to know what the Quantum Pendant is for. About 15 of the delegates bought FusionExcel products and many of them also showed interest in the E-Pack.

FusionExcel also celebrated Father's Day for all the delegates present at the Conference.

A top Government Official of Sri Lanka has offered to organize a FusionExcel BEP in Sri Lanka. This is a great breakthrough for FusionExcel in one more country! 

Jai Ho! Jai Ho!! Jai Ho!!!
